itemDescription: Recipient of the Victoria Cross, and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Bryan VC (21 January 1882 – 13 October 1945) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

link_mentions.page: List of English Victoria Cross recipients
response: | Thomas Bryan || British Army || 1917 || First World War || Arras
